joinitems.title: 15000 sq.m.
joinitems.text: No queues at the simulators. Premium equipment from LifeStyle, Hammer Strength, TechnoGym.

joinitems.title: More than 200 equipment
joinitems.text: No queues at the simulators. Premium equipment from LifeStyle, Hammer Strength, TechnoGym.

joinitems.title: 4 fitness zones
joinitems.text: From cardio to functional and cycle. Separate area for boxing and mixed martial arts

joinitems.title: Round-the-clock operation
joinitems.text: The gym is open 24 hours a day, also works on all holidays and weekends
